file_content.text: I hoped you would come. Our prior meeting terminated unsatisfactorily.
Surrender, and you will be treated well. Resist, and... well, you know the rest.
My fellow Jedi is taking the technical readouts you came here for. Even if I die, you still lose.
You've already lost.
If I die, I consider that a loss. Just saying.
Stop it. You'll make him cry.
T7 + Jedi = smart // Imperials = idiots
Your friend will not leave this dreadnaught alive.
Why take me alive? What does the Emperor want?
What is your mission?
Even if I could answer you, I wouldn't. I serve my master's will.
Not much of a conversationalist, is he?
He doesn't know. He's just following orders, like a droid.
You don't look like standard Imperial military. Who do you work for?
Who are you?
We are the Emperor's Guard. We protect him. Kill for him. Die for him.
And you just know they're underpaid.
Fanatics. Lovely.
T7 sensors = detect Imperial weapons loading!
I gave you a fair chance and you refused it. Men, kill this Jedi.
The rest is... you leave Hoth in pieces.
I kill you. [Attack]
All who stand against us will die.
